# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : examine.py
@Author      : liuda
@Time        : 2022/3/7 09:46
@Description :
"""
from copy import deepcopy
import datetime

from django.db import transaction
from rest_framework import serializers
from rest_framework.exceptions import APIException

from client.models.company import Company
from client.models.contract import Contract
from client.models.credit_certificate import (
    ReviewLog, CreditCertificate, WorkFlow, WorkFlowBusinessMap,
    TransferLog, CreditCertificateEnclosure, CreditCurrentNode, FinanceProject
)
from client.models.evidence import ChainEvidence, EvidenceType
from client.models.user import S1User
from client.serializers import credit_approval_detail
from client.tasks import unconfirmed_open_accept_job, unconfirmed_transfer_accept_job
from consts.common import (
    DATE_FORMAT, DATETIME_FORMAT, DATETIME_MINUTE_FORMAT,
    CREDIT_CERTIFICATE_PAY_LIMIT, EvidenceTypeNameEnum,
    TRANSFER_EXAMINE_CODE, OPEN_EXAMINE_CODE, FINANCE_REVIEW_CODE
)
from management.serializers import credit_certificate_manage
from utils.data_2_chain import ChainUtil
from utils.date_and_time import n_hours_later
from utils.fen_and_yuan import fen_to_yuan



[文档]def file_to_chain(data, cc_id, evidence_type_name: EvidenceTypeNameEnum):
    """
    将文件上链
    @param data: 数据
    @param cc_id: 智信id
    @return:
    """
    chain_obj = ChainUtil()
    tx_hash = chain_obj.transfer(data)
    if not tx_hash:
        raise APIException('上链失败, 请重试!')
    evidence_type = EvidenceType.objects.filter(name=evidence_type_name.value).only('id').first()
    ChainEvidence.objects.create(
        data_type='file',
        credit_certificate_id=cc_id,
        tx_hash=tx_hash,
        evidence_type_id=evidence_type.pk
    )




[文档]def confirmed_to_chain(cc: CreditCertificate, business_flow: WorkFlowBusinessMap):
    """
    确权后的上链操作
    @param cc: 某信
    @param business_flow: 工作流
    @return:
    """
    # 付款函
    contract = Contract.objects.filter(
        credit_certificate_id=cc.pk,
        contract_type='pay'
    ).only('number').first()

    # 支付方审核人: 最后一次内部审核通过的审批日志
    if cc.business.name == 'open':
        work_flow_code = OPEN_EXAMINE_CODE
        evidence_type_name = EvidenceTypeNameEnum.OPEN
        if contract:
            file_to_chain({'files': contract.content}, cc.pk, EvidenceTypeNameEnum.PAY)
    elif cc.business.name == 'transfer':
        work_flow_code = TRANSFER_EXAMINE_CODE
        evidence_type_name = EvidenceTypeNameEnum.TRANSFER
    else:
        work_flow_code = FINANCE_REVIEW_CODE
        evidence_type_name = EvidenceTypeNameEnum.FINANCE
    work_flow = WorkFlow.objects.filter(code=work_flow_code).only('id').first()
    review_log = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
        data_table=CreditCertificate._meta.db_table,
        data_id=cc.pk,
        result='pass',
        work_flow_id=work_flow.pk,
        handle_status='done',
    ).only('s1_user_id').order_by('-id').first()
    # 获取用户名
    try:
        review_log_user = S1User.objects.using('credible_data').get(id=review_log.s1_user_id)
        cc_user = S1User.objects.using('credible_data').get(id=cc.s1_user_id)
    except S1User.DoesNotExist:
        raise APIException('用户名不存在！！')

    TransferLog.objects.create(
        credit_certificate_id=cc.pk,
        pay_company_name=cc.from_company.name,
        pay_company_code=cc.from_company.credit_code,
        receive_company_name=cc.company.name,
        receive_company_code=cc.company.credit_code,
        open_company_name=cc.credit.receive_company.name,
        open_company_code=cc.credit.receive_company.credit_code,
        contract_number=contract.number if contract else '',
        amount=cc.amount,
        promise_pay_at=cc.promise_pay_at,
        pay_reviewer=review_log_user.nick_name,
        pay_handler=cc_user.nick_name
    )

    # 审批信息
    chain_review_logs = []
    review_logs = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
        data_table=CreditCertificate._meta.db_table,
        data_id=cc.pk,
        work_flow_id__in=list(range(business_flow.start_work_flow_id, business_flow.end_work_flow_id+1)),
    ).select_related('work_flow').only(
        's1_user_id', 'review_at', 'opinion', 'enclosure', 'data_id', 'data_table', 'result', 'node',
        'handle_status', 'work_flow__title'
    ).order_by('id')
    s1_user_ids = set(i.s1_user_id for i in review_logs)
    s1_user_info = dict(S1User.objects.using('credible_data').filter(pk__in=s1_user_ids).values_list('pk', 'nick_name'))
    for item in review_logs:
        chain_review_logs.append({
            'opinion': item.opinion,
            'enclosure': item.enclosure,
            'data_id': item.data_id,
            'data_table': item.data_table,
            'result': item.result,
            'review_at': item.review_at.strftime(DATETIME_FORMAT),
            's1_user_id': item.s1_user_id,
            's1_user_nick_name': s1_user_info[item.s1_user_id],
            'node': item.node,
            'work_flow': item.work_flow.title,
            'handle_status': item.handle_status
        })

    # 要件信息
    credit_certificate_enclosures = []
    enclosures = CreditCertificateEnclosure.objects.filter(credit_certificate_id=cc.pk).order_by('id').only(
        'created_at', 'contract_no', 'contract_amount', 'contract_enclosure', 'contract_sign_at', 'invoice_enclosure', 'other_enclosure'
    )
    for enclosure in enclosures:
        credit_certificate_enclosures.append({
            'id': enclosure.pk,
            'created_at': enclosure.created_at.strftime(DATETIME_FORMAT),
            'contract_no': enclosure.contract_no,
            'contract_amount': fen_to_yuan(enclosure.contract_amount),
            'contract_enclosure': enclosure.contract_enclosure,
            'contract_sign_at': enclosure.contract_sign_at.strftime(DATE_FORMAT),
            'invoice_enclosure': enclosure.invoice_enclosure,
            'other_enclosure': enclosure.other_enclosure,
        })

    # 基础信息
    base_data = {
        'credit_certificate_type': cc.business.name,
        'credit_number': cc.credit.credit_number,
        'start': cc.credit.start.strftime(DATE_FORMAT),
        'end': cc.credit.end.strftime(DATE_FORMAT),
        'punishment_rate': '%.2f' % cc.credit.punishment_rate,
        'financing_annualized_interest_rate': '%.2f' % cc.credit.financing_annualized_interest_rate,
        'technical_service_rate': '%.2f' % cc.credit.technical_service_rate,
        'information_consultation_rate': '%.2f' % cc.credit.information_consultation_rate,
        'number': cc.number,
        'amount': fen_to_yuan(cc.amount),
        'promise_pay_at': cc.promise_pay_at.strftime(DATE_FORMAT),
        'confirm_at': cc.confirm_at.strftime(DATE_FORMAT),
        'receive_company_name': cc.credit.receive_company.name,
        'receive_company_credit_code': cc.credit.receive_company.credit_code,
        'from_company_name': cc.from_company.name,
        'from_company_credit_code': cc.from_company.credit_code,
        'company_name': cc.company.name,
        'company_credit_code': cc.company.credit_code,
    }

    # 上链
    chain_data = {
        'credit_certificate': base_data,
        'enclosure': credit_certificate_enclosures,
        'review_logs': chain_review_logs
    }
    chain_obj = ChainUtil()
    tx_hash = chain_obj.transfer(chain_data)
    if not tx_hash:
        raise APIException('上链失败, 请重试!')
    evidence_type = EvidenceType.objects.filter(name=evidence_type_name.value).only('id').first()
    ChainEvidence.objects.create(
        data_type='data',
        credit_certificate_id=cc.pk,
        tx_hash=tx_hash,
        evidence_type_id=evidence_type.pk
    )




[文档]class ReviewLogSerializer(serializers.ModelSerializer):
    review_at = serializers.DateTimeField(format=DATETIME_MINUTE_FORMAT)
    s1_user = serializers.SerializerMethodField(read_only=True)
    enclosure = serializers.JSONField(default=[])


[文档]    def get_s1_user(self, instance):
        """
        获取用户名
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        try:
            user = S1User.objects.using("credible_data").get(pk=instance.s1_user_id)
            return user.nick_name
        except S1User.DoesNotExist:
            return ""



[文档]    class Meta:
        model = ReviewLog
        fields = [
            "id", "opinion", "enclosure", "result", "node",
            "review_at", "handle_status", "s1_user"
        ]




[文档]class CreditCertificateReviewSerializer(serializers.Serializer):
    opinion = serializers.CharField(allow_null=True, allow_blank=True)
    result = serializers.ChoiceField(choices=ReviewLog.result_choices[1:])
    enclosure = serializers.JSONField()


[文档]    def create(self, validated_data): pass



[文档]    @staticmethod
    def check(instance: CreditCertificate, company_id, credit_current_node):
        """
        检查
        @param instance:
        @param company_id:
        @param credit_current_node:
        @return:
        """
        now = datetime.datetime.now().date()
        # 如果是开立或者转让 判断是否到接收时限
        if instance.business.name in ("open", "transfer"):
            if instance.expire_at is not None and instance.expire_at <= now:
                raise APIException("已经超过接收时限")
        if hasattr(instance, "creditcleardetail"):
            raise APIException("已经清分无法审核")
        if (instance.promise_pay_at - now).days <= CREDIT_CERTIFICATE_PAY_LIMIT:
            raise APIException("信用凭证即将清分，无法审核")
        # 判断是不是有审核权限
        company = Company.objects.get(pk=company_id)
        # 如果当前节点是资金方审核 那么要判断这个某信的资金机构
        # 1 判断request.company是不是资金机构
        # 2 判断x信的资金机构是不是request.company
        if credit_current_node.work_flow.code in ("approval_review", "fin_fund_side_review"):
            if company.company_type.name != "financial_institutions":
                raise APIException("您不是资金机构，无法审核。")
        # 如果是接收确认 需要判断x信的接收方是不是request.company
        if credit_current_node.work_flow.code in ("receive_confirm", "open_receive_confirm"):
            if instance.company_id != company_id:
                raise APIException("接收企业不是您，无法审核。")
        # 如果是审批(公司内部审批) 需要判断x信的发起方是不是request.company
        if credit_current_node.work_flow.code in ("transfer_examine", "open_examine", "finance_review"):
            if instance.from_company_id != company_id:
                raise APIException("发起企业不是您，无法审核。")
        if credit_current_node.work_flow.code in ("open_platform_review", "finance_platform"):
            raise APIException("无法进行平台审核。")



[文档]    def handle_pass(self, instance: CreditCertificate, business_flow, credit_current_node: CreditCurrentNode):
        """
        处理审核通过情况
        @param instance:
        @param validated_data: 序列化数据
        @param business_flow: 业务工作流
        @param credit_current_node: 当前节点
        @return:
        """
        # 获取当前工作流
        current_work_flow = deepcopy(credit_current_node.work_flow)
        # 查询下一个工作流
        path = current_work_flow.path if current_work_flow.path else []
        path.append(current_work_flow.code)
        next_work_flow = WorkFlow.objects.filter(path=path).first()
        if not next_work_flow:
            raise APIException('非法请求')
        # 修改credit_current_node的work_flow为工作流的下一步
        credit_current_node.work_flow = next_work_flow
        # 保存数据
        credit_current_node.save(update_fields=['work_flow', 'updated_at'])

        # 额外操作 判断当前工作任务流是 "开立审批"或者是"转让审核"
        if current_work_flow.code in ("transfer_examine", "open_examine"):
            # 计算过期时间
            now = datetime.datetime.now()
            expire_at = n_hours_later(now, instance.credit_certificate_receive_time_limit.value)
            expire_at_str = str(expire_at.date())

            # 更新过期时间
            instance.expire_at = expire_at.date()
            instance.save(update_fields=['expire_at', 'updated_at'])

            # 添加延迟任务
            task_dict = {
                "open_examine": unconfirmed_open_accept_job,
                "transfer_examine": unconfirmed_transfer_accept_job,
            }
            task_dict[current_work_flow.code].apply_async(args=(instance.id, expire_at_str), eta=expire_at)
            return

        # 判断是否自动完成下N步, 也就是说执行到了工作流的最后一步
        if credit_current_node.work_flow.id != business_flow.end_work_flow.id:
            return

        # 最后一步: 自动创建最后一步 审批日志
        snapshot = self.create_snapshot(instance)
        ReviewLog.objects.create(
            opinion='通过',
            result='pass',
            data_id=instance.id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            s1_user_id=self.context.get("user_id"),
            handle_status="done",
            review_at=datetime.datetime.now(),
            work_flow=credit_current_node.work_flow,
            node=credit_current_node.work_flow.title,
            snapshot=snapshot
        )

        # 融资业务到此为止
        if instance.business.name == 'financing':
            return

        instance.review_status = 'pass'
        # 确权时间
        instance.confirm_at = datetime.datetime.now()
        instance.save(update_fields=['review_status', 'confirm_at', 'updated_at'])

        confirmed_to_chain(instance, business_flow)



[文档]    def handle_reject(self, instance: CreditCertificate, business_flow, credit_current_node):
        """
        处理拒绝情况
        @param instance:
        @param business_flow: 业务工作流
        @param credit_current_node: 当前节点
        @return:
        """
        # 拒绝状态
        instance.review_status = 'reject'
        instance.save(update_fields=['review_status', 'updated_at'])
        # 修改credit_current_node的work_flow为工作流的第一步
        credit_current_node.work_flow_id = business_flow.start_work_flow_id
        credit_current_node.save(update_fields=['work_flow', 'updated_at'])

        if instance.business.name == 'financing':
            FinanceProject.objects.filter(credit_certificate_id=instance.pk).update(
                status='backed', updated_at=datetime.datetime.now()
            )



[文档]    def create_snapshot(self, instance: CreditCertificate):
        """
        生成审批快照
        @param instance:
        @return:
        """
        business_name = instance.business.name
        if business_name == "open":
            # 开立类型
            serializer = credit_certificate_manage.CreditApprovalDetailSerializer(instance)
        elif business_name == "transfer":
            # 转让ReceiveCCApprovalDetailSerializer
            serializer = credit_approval_detail.ReceiveCCApprovalDetailSerializer(instance)
        elif business_name == "financing":
            # 融资
            serializer = credit_approval_detail.CapitalFinanceApprovalDetailNestedSerializer(instance)
        else:
            return None
        return serializer.data



[文档]    def create_log(self, instance, validated_data, credit_current_node):
        """

        @param instance:
        @param validated_data:
        @param credit_current_node: 某信当前节点
        @return:
        """
        current_work_flow = credit_current_node.work_flow
        snapshot = self.create_snapshot(instance)
        ReviewLog.objects.create(
            **validated_data,
            data_id=instance.id,
            data_table="credit_certificate",
            s1_user_id=self.context.get("user_id"),
            handle_status="done",
            review_at=datetime.datetime.now(),
            work_flow=current_work_flow,
            node=current_work_flow.title,
            snapshot=snapshot
        )



[文档]    def update(self, instance: CreditCertificate, validated_data):
        """
        更新逻辑
        @param instance:
        @param validated_data:
        @return:
        """
        # 创建review_log，data_table字段写credit_certificate
        with transaction.atomic():
            # 获取当前节点
            credit_current_node = instance.creditcurrentnode
            company_id = self.context.get("company_id")
            self.check(instance, company_id, credit_current_node)

            # 创建审批日志
            self.create_log(instance, validated_data, credit_current_node)
            # 获取工作流
            business_flow = WorkFlowBusinessMap.objects.get(business_id=instance.business_id)
            # 是否审核通过
            if validated_data.get('result') == 'pass':
                # 处理审核通过
                self.handle_pass(instance, business_flow, credit_current_node)
            else:
                # 处理审核拒绝
                self.handle_reject(instance, business_flow, credit_current_node)

        return instance
